title: pippo420
author: pippo420
created_time: December 07, 2022, 10:20:08 PMLast edit: December 07, 2022, 10:44:24 PM by pippo420
content: You can buy crypto with payoneer by paying only a 10% commission! I support most altcoins. Also support local bank transfer to EU iban or US account (they are dedicated, no need for a reference number or similar, so good for your stripe account or any payment gateway). Even small amounts and absolutely no kyc.I accept trusted escrows. Contact me using the forum PM to make a trade!I have only recently provided this service, but I have been in the cryptocurrency world for a long time and will do whatever it takes to be professional.

comments.author: VictorInv
comments.body: Hello,Can you let me know if your IBAN service covers the following requirements?I am a resident of Mauritius and need a dedicated UK/LT IBAN under my name. (not business or company account)It needs to be able to both transfer and receive internationally (EU & overseas) (sepa/swift).It also needs to be gambling/crypto friendly (e.g support wire withdrawals from Binance, Bet365, etc)Kindly let me know if you can offer this and the fees related. Feel free to PM me. (you also need to adjust your PM option to allow messages)Regards,
